messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Queue.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Models the states and transitions of an interactive queue exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application transitions to 'updating' state when enqueue or dequeue actions are performed, and returns to 'idle' once the queue display is updated.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Linked List.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for the Interactive Linked List Explorer application.
fsm.notes: States represent the main actions of adding and removing nodes in the linked list.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) exploration application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the main interactive states of the KNN application, focusing on point selection and classification.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Stack.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive stack exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application allows users to push and pop elements from a stack, with visual feedback on actions.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Binary Search Tree (BST).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an Interactive Binary Search Tree (BST) exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application allows users to insert and delete nodes in a binary search tree, with visual feedback provided through SVG rendering.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Bubble Sort.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for the interactive bubble sort visualization application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the states of generating an array, sorting it, and handling user interactions.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Heap (Min/Max).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive heap exploration application.
fsm.notes: States represent the main actions of inserting and removing values from the heap, with transitions based on button clicks and completion of actions.
